result.eng: Is there anything happening?
result.ga: An bhfuil a dhath ar siúl
result.orig: An bhfuil a dhath ar siúl
result.html: An bhfuil a dhath ar siúlIs there anything happening?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil a ḋaṫ ar siúlIs there anything happening?

result.eng: The televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.
result.ga: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi mórán
result.orig: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi mórán
result.html: Bhí an teilifís ar siúl sa chúlra ach ní raibh mé ag féachaint uirthi móránThe televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an teilifís ar siúl sa ċúlra aċ ní raiḃ mé ag féaċaint uirṫi móránThe televison was on in the background but I wasn't watching it much.

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.html: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aġaiḋ go dtí an teaċ táḃairne um ṫráṫnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.eng: He always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ga: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.orig: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.html: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ sé i gcónaí ar ṫús caḋnaíoċta nuair a ḃíoḋ cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.

result.eng: What's going on back there?
result.ga: Cad atá ar siúl thiar ansin
result.orig: Cad atá ar siúl thiar ansin
result.html: Cad atá ar siúl thiar ansinWhat's going on back there?

result.eng: What exactly will be going on?

result.eng: The competition is on tomorrow.
result.ga: Tá an comórtas ar siúl amárach
result.orig: Tá an comórtas ar siúl amárach
result.html: Tá an comórtas ar siúl amárachThe competition is on tomorrow.

result.eng: The work is still in progress.

result.orig: Tá an obair ar siúl i gcónaí
result.html: Tá an obair ar siúl i gcónaíThe work is still in progress.
result.ponchtml: Tá an obair ar siúl i gcónaíThe work is still in progress.

result.eng: Oh, Cré na Cille by Máirtín Ó Cadhain is playing there at present.
result.ga: Ó tá Cré na Cille le Máirtín Ó Cadhain ar siúl ann faoi láthair

result.eng: There is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.
result.ga: Tá cluiche peile idir An Spidéal agus An Cheathrú Rua ar siúl ar an bpáirc

result.eng: I know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl

result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam gur ag a dó a ċlog atá m'agallaṁ ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.

result.eng: My classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.
result.ga: Bíonn mo chuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceathair a chlog chuile thráthnóna

result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo ċuid ranganna ar siúl ag a ceaṫair a ċlog ċuile ṫráṫnónaMy classes are [usually] at four o'clock each afternoon.

result.eng: It's on at eight o'clock on TG4.
result.ga: Bíonn sé ar siúl ag a hocht a chlog ar TG4
result.orig: Bíonn sé ar siúl ag a hocht a chlog ar TG4

result.eng: Won't Ros na Rún be on after that?

result.eng: We are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.

result.eng: There are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.

result.eng: Listen, what are you doing tonight?

result.eng: I'm not married but I've been going out with someone for three years now.
result.ga: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois
result.orig: Níl mé pósta ach tá mé ag siúl amach le duine éigin le trí bliana anois

result.eng: They are scheming something!
result.ga: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.orig: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acu
result.html: Tá uisce faoi thalamh éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!
result.ponchtml: Tá uisce faoi ṫalaṁ éigin ar siúl acuThey are scheming something!

result.eng: They were walking towards each other.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéile
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéile
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl i dtreo a chéileThey were walking towards each other.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl i dtreo a ċéileThey were walking towards each other.

result.eng: I turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.
result.ga: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáil
result.orig: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáil

result.ponchtml: Ċuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil ċun nuaċtċlár na maidine a ċloisteáilI turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ Níorḃ é sin do Ṡéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
